roles.name: Software Engineer Consultant
bulletPoints: Expanded working knowledge to 7+ applications and services that extended languages or frameworks like AngularJS, Java, Spring and Spring Boot.
Gained extensive domain knowledge of systems and applications, earning the reputation as the go-to expert for servicing and quoting side of business.
Led an effort to fix data integrity issues across multiple systems significantly reducing agent and customer complications.
Assisted with the successful delivery of a transformational project building out new policy servicing platforms for both the agent and customer.
Strengthened client relationship by establishing trust and confidence through exceptional performance in an area we previously had no involvement in.

roles.name: Senior Software Engineer Consultant
bulletPoints: Expanded working knowledge to 18+ applications and services that extended languages or frameworks like AngularJS, Java, Spring and Spring Boot.
Assisted with the acquisition of a $56 million, 5 year contract bringing on 50+ additional developers to work across 56 client-owned applications.
Managed a team of 11 offshore developers and business system analysts to maintain and enhance a portfolio of 22 client-owned applications.

Played a key role in the successful rollout of a commercial line of business into our new servicing platforms by managing a small offshore team of 2 developers and contributing to the transformational project.
